lyrics:
4 contributorshappily never after lyricsverse 1 nicole scherzinger
i dont think i want this anymore
as she drops the ring to the floor
she says to herself youve left before
this time you will stay gone thats for sure

prechorus nicole scherzinger
and he shattered something as
she dragged her suitcase down the path
to the driveway
she had never gone that far
normally this would be
the time that she
would let him talk her out of leaving
but this time without crying
as she got into her car

chorus nicole scherzinger
she said no
happily never after
that just aint for me because finally because finally
i know i deserve better after all
ill never let another teardrop fall

verse 2 nicole scherzinger
as she drove away she starts to smile
realized she hadnt for a while
no destination she drove for miles
wonderin why she stayed in such denial
you might also likeprechorus nicole scherzinger

she dragged her suitcase down the path
to the driveway to the driveway
she had never gone that far never gone that far
normally this would be
the time that she
would let him talk her out of leaving
but this time without crying
as she got into her car

chorus nicole scherzinger

happily never after
that just aint for me because finally because finally
